title: Indiana Historical Collections
additional-note: Volumes in this series may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such volumes are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial. The renewal record for volume 32 is the earliest one that specifically mentions 'Indiana Historical Collections', but there may be earlier renewed volumes we did not find due to the omission of the series title in the renewal record.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Erica Lu for copyright research on this title.
